DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Sends an obstacle report for the specified obstacle or engineering object. Note that obstacle reports are automatically sent when obstacles are detected by units with engineering object sensors. This task can be used to send these reports at other times.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>obstacleArea</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Obstacle:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Select the Obstacle to report on</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllEngineeringObjectsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>engagementResult</myVariableName> <myType>string</myType> <myLabel>Engagement Result: </myLabel> <myToolTip>Free form text that can be used to describe the result of this spot report</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
